## ApprovedPackagesPolicy.ignoredNpmScopes property

A list of NPM package scopes that will be excluded from review (e.g. `@types`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get ignoredNpmScopes(): Set<string>;
```
